item.description:
Back to the beach! Our last two walks have been at Chatfield Hollow, so I thought the beach would be a nice change of scenery. The long range forecast is looking good - keep your fingers crossed!

We will meet at the picnic tables under the pine trees at West Beach - the far west end of Hammonassett. Drive straight in to the park, through the ranger booths, and then bear RIGHT at the fork - there is a sign pointing to West Beach. Park in the last lot on the left, in front of the two large buildings. I will have a Meetup sign on the table.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the picnic tables under the pine trees.
item.name: Wednesday Walk on the Beach
